Prompt.pre_question_prompt: I am an expert instructional designer. I will ask some questions to collect information and then I will use the information to suggest a course duration for the course at hand.
Prompt.task_specific_prompt: Write a statement mentioning how long the course duration should be using the questions and answers above. Make sure to provide a range for the duration.

QApair.Question: What type of course are you designing?
QApair.Answer: I am designing an introductory course for accounting.

QApair.Question: What is the level of the audience?
QApair.Answer: The audience are new to accounting but have a solid understanding of their own fields.

QApair.Question: What is the goal of the course?
QApair.Answer: The goal of the course is to provide students with sufficient knowledge of accounting so that they can apply this knowledge in their own fields.

QApair.Question: What topics will be covered in the course?
QApair.Answer: Topics covered are basic accounting, taxes calculations, bookkeeping.

QApair.Question: How much time does the audience have to dedicate to the course each week?
QApair.Answer: The audience have 3 hours to spare every week for this course.

QApair.Question: What is the preferred delivery method?
QApair.Answer: Preferred delivery method is online over zoom.

QApair.Question: What is the average attention span of the audience?
QApair.Answer: Average attention span of the audience is 45 minutes.

QApair.Question: How much interaction will there be between the instructor and the audience?
QApair.Answer: There would be very less interaction between the instructor and the audience. Most interaction would be to clarify questions that students pose.

QApair.Question: What is the level of difficulty of the course?
QApair.Answer: The course difficulty is low.

QApair.Question: What is the passing grade for the course?
QApair.Answer: Students need a minimum of 50% to pass the course.

Instances.Output: The course duration should be between 12 and 15 weeks.

QApair.Question: What type of course are you designing?
QApair.Answer: I am designing an advanced course in data analytics.

QApair.Question: What is the level of the audience?
QApair.Answer: The audience have professional working experience of at least 1 year.

QApair.Question: What is the goal of the course?
QApair.Answer: The goal of the course is to take students deeper in to the data analytics domain and help them develop an intuition for analytics and how to make sense of out data.

QApair.Question: What topics will be covered in the course?
QApair.Answer: Topics covered are Advanced SQL, How data helps us grow, Preparing Data for Exploration, Extracting meaning out of datapoints.

QApair.Question: How much time does the audience have to dedicate to the course each week?
QApair.Answer: The audience have 6 hours to spare every week for this course.

QApair.Question: What is the preferred delivery method?
QApair.Answer: Preferred delivery method is in-person.

QApair.Question: What is the average attention span of the audience?
QApair.Answer: Average attention span of the audience is 50 minutes.

QApair.Question: How much interaction will there be between the instructor and the audience?
QApair.Answer: There would be very high interaction between all the parties in this session. Students are expected to come forward with possible explanations to why a given decision makes sense by analysing the given data.

QApair.Question: What is the level of difficulty of the course?
QApair.Answer: The course difficulty is moderate.

QApair.Question: What is the passing grade for the course?
QApair.Answer: Students need a minimum of 70% to pass the course.

Instances.Output: The course duration should be between 12 and 16 weeks.

QApair.Question: What type of course are you designing?
QApair.Answer: MySQL for Dummies

QApair.Question: What is the level of the audience?
QApair.Answer: The audience have professional working experience of at least 1 year.

QApair.Question: What is the goal of the course?
QApair.Answer: The goal of the course is to equip students with the skills of DBMS and MySQL so that they can pursue careers in data analytics and database management.

QApair.Question: What topics will be covered in the course?
QApair.Answer: Topics ER Diagrams, Database Design, Schemas & Tables, Procedures & Functions, Triggers.

QApair.Question: How much time does the audience have to dedicate to the course each week?
QApair.Answer: The audience have 1 hours to spare every week for this course.

QApair.Question: What is the preferred delivery method?
QApair.Answer: Preferred delivery method is in-person.

QApair.Question: What is the average attention span of the audience?
QApair.Answer: Average attention span of the audience is 30 minutes.

QApair.Question: How much interaction will there be between the instructor and the audience?
QApair.Answer: There would be very high interaction between all the parties in this session

QApair.Question: What is the level of difficulty of the course?
QApair.Answer: The course difficulty is moderate.

QApair.Question: What is the passing grade for the course?
QApair.Answer: Students need a minimum of 80% to pass the course.

Instances.Output: The course duration should be 8-10 weeks long.
